Articles.Content: Where can I find good and proper documentation of what goes into a .CFG file? I'd like to build a graphical tool to build one dynamically, but I'm not sure what all goes in them, or what each wants for a value. Is it even worth doing?

This one? http://kspwiki.nexisonline.net/wiki/CFG_File_Documentation

Yeah, a bit outdated, but I've seen no newer version...
I know of that one, but it is very little more than the bare bones version. I was hoping something more comprehensive existed.

I know of that one, but it is very little more than the bare bones version. I was hoping something more comprehensive existed.

You are not the only one. Most stuff we don't know about is something the devs know, they will update the wiki eventually.
Or you can update it yourself, it is a wiki, anyone can edit it
If I already knew how it all worked, I wouldn't need documentation. Hard to add information you don't have.
